resources.string: * Remember to drop your video file onto this page from your desktop along with your editing file before you click submit

When offline...

You cannot create new trips

You can save gems, activities, and restuarants and add basic details

Also! Remember to take your photos outside the Ravle App to link them later

When you have service again you will be prompted to update these trip contents back online
Please refine GPS location by zooming in on the map to confirm the dropped location is exactly where you were.\n\nUse the second pin to refine your dropped GPS location
